location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a copy of a telegram sent to the Foreign Office by HM Ambassador to the United States, regarding a message sent by the Sultan of Muscat to the Head of the Muscat Mission in Bagdad [Baghdad] instructing him to approach the United States Legation for travelling expenses to return to Muscat.

name.namePart: Sultan of Muscat and Oman, Āl Bū Sa'īd Dynasty
HM Ambassador to the United States of America
